contract aims at deploying lockers that will invest in Convex pools.          Plain pools should contain only stablecoins denominated in same currency (all tokens in USD or all tokens in EUR for example, otherwise USD_Convertible won't be correct)","kind":"dev","methods":{"USD_Convertible()":{"details":"returns the value of our LP position in USD."},"constructor":{"params":{"_BASE_TOKEN_MP":"if metapool should specify the address of the base token of the pool. If plain pool, set to the zero address.","_CVX_Deposit_Address":"address of the convex Booster contract.","_MP_UNDERLYING_LP_POOL":"if metapool specify address of the underlying LP token's pool (3CRV for example).","_ZivoeAddresses":"_ZivoeAddresses[0] = The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO) and _ZivoeAddresses[1] = GBL (the ZivoeGlobals contract).","_boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards":"_boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[0] => If true: metapool, if false: plain pool. _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[1] => if true: extra rewards distributed on top of CRV or CVX.","_chainlinkPriceFeeds":"array containing the addresses of the chainlink price feeds, should be provided in correct order (refer to coins index in Curve pool)","_convexPoolID":"Indicate the ID of the Convex pool where the LP token should be staked.","_curvePool":"address of the Curve Pool.","_numberOfTokensPP":"If pool is a metapool, set to 0. If plain pool, specify the number of coins in the pool.","_numberOfTokensUnderlyingLPPool":"if metapool: specify the number of tokens in the underlying LP pool (for 3CRV pool set to 3). If plain pool: set to 0.","_rewardsAddresses":"addresses of the extra rewards. If _extraRewards = false set as an array of the zero address."}},"forwardYieldKeeperCRV_CVX(address,bytes)":{"details":"This function converts and forwards rewards to the YDL. TODO: check if optimal to call for each asset separately. Will have to check to transfer the rewards that equal to the distributedAsset() (separate public fct ?) + set accounting for rewards to 0."},"harvestYield()":{"details":"public accessible function to harvest yield every 30 days. Yield will have to be transferred to YDL by a keeper via forwardYieldKeeper() TODO: implement treshold for baseline above which we decide to sell LP tokens as yield ?"},"invest()":{"details":"This directs tokens into a Curve Pool and then stakes the LP into Convex."},"keeperConvertStablecoin(address,address,bytes)":{"details":"give Keepers a way to pre-convert assets via 1INCH"},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}. USD_Convertible().details: returns the value of our LP position in USD.

params._BASE_TOKEN_MP: if metapool should specify the address of the base token of the pool. If plain pool, set to the zero address.
params._CVX_Deposit_Address: address of the convex Booster contract.
params._MP_UNDERLYING_LP_POOL: if metapool specify address of the underlying LP token's pool (3CRV for example).
params._ZivoeAddresses: _ZivoeAddresses[0] = The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO) and _ZivoeAddresses[1] = GBL (the ZivoeGlobals contract).
params._boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards: _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[0] => If true: metapool, if false: plain pool. _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[1] => if true: extra rewards distributed on top of CRV or CVX.
params._chainlinkPriceFeeds: array containing the addresses of the chainlink price feeds, should be provided in correct order (refer to coins index in Curve pool)
params._convexPoolID: Indicate the ID of the Convex pool where the LP token should be staked.
params._numberOfTokensPP: If pool is a metapool, set to 0. If plain pool, specify the number of coins in the pool.
params._numberOfTokensUnderlyingLPPool: if metapool: specify the number of tokens in the underlying LP pool (for 3CRV pool set to 3). If plain pool: set to 0.
params._rewardsAddresses: addresses of the extra rewards. If _extraRewards = false set as an array of the zero address.

forwardYieldKeeperCRV_CVX(address,bytes).details: This function converts and forwards rewards to the YDL. TODO: check if optimal to call for each asset separately. Will have to check to transfer the rewards that equal to the distributedAsset() (separate public fct ?) + set accounting for rewards to 0.

harvestYield().details: public accessible function to harvest yield every 30 days. Yield will have to be transferred to YDL by a keeper via forwardYieldKeeper() TODO: implement treshold for baseline above which we decide to sell LP tokens as yield ?

invest().details: This directs tokens into a Curve Pool and then stakes the LP into Convex.

keeperConvertStablecoin(address,address,.details: give Keepers a way to pre-convert assets via 1INCH

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

pullFromLockerMulti(address[]).details: This divests allocation from Convex and Curve pool and returns capital to the DAO.

params.assets: The assets to return. TODO: check for duplicate assets + should we use the assets parameter ? + Check rewards in the future in tests.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

pullFromLockerPartial(address,uint256).details: This burns a partial amount of LP tokens from the Convex FRAX-USDC staking pool,         removes the liquidity from Curve and returns resulting coins back to the DAO.

params.amount: The amount of LP tokens to burn.
params.convexRewardAddress: The Convex contract to call to withdraw LP tokens.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

numberOfTokensUnderlyingLPPool().notice: Needed to calculate the LP price of the underlying LP Token

pullFromLocker(address).notice: Migrates entire ERC20 balance from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC721(address,uint256,byt.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint.notice: Migrates ERC721s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiPartial(address[],uin.notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pushToLocker(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC721(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMulti(address[],uint256[]).notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint25.notice: Migrates ERC721s from owner() to locker.

@dev    This contract aims at deploying lockers that will invest in Convex pools. 
         Plain pools should contain only stablecoins denominated in same currency (all tokens in USD or all tokens in EUR for example, otherwise USD_Convertible won't be correct)
